transcript: I had a decent amount of successful and she and I met and then I lost everything I didn't just lose everything once I actually lost everything twice the absolute rock bottom of that whole period of time I actually told her I thought she should leave me I respect her I cared about I was like we're cool if you leave I respect you I was trying to sell her on leaving me and she grabbed my chin and she pulled it towards me and she was like I would sleep with you under a bridge if it came to that in some ways like she sold me on me I'm just the guy she met on the internet who lost everything and now we're crashing at her parents house I think our marriage is rarer than our business success I'm very grateful for that
